title: Subject complexity
content:
In sem2 (phy cycle), how would u order subjects based on their difficulty in exams.
This is my assumption (easy to hard)
Mechanical,c, electrical,math,phy.
Am i right?

comments.body: Sem 2 phy cycle was the beginning of my downfall
Electrical is the easiest subject in the entire first year

phy>mech>EEE
eee is easy af ,very easy to score above 35 especially in ISA 2 ,mech is shit,you need to mug up almost everything from the slides even some diagrams urghhh

Mechanical is easy u just have to byheart 
Eee is based on how well u understand 
Maths if you listen to class and do cw problems and pesu academy questions u can do it easily
Phy for me was hardest 
C make sure u do pesu academy notes " not slides "

Here's your order:

the subject you find least interesting > subjects in middle > subject you find most interesting
Mech and EEE are the easiest subjects. In fact EEE is prolly the easiest subject in all of first year.
So among eee,mech and phy how theoretical or numerical based are the tests
So among eee,mech and phy how theoretical or numerical based are the tests

Mech 10% are numerical 
Eee is almost 100%
Phy 30-40%
